resources.string: Brief makes use of some Open source licenced software
Are you sure you wish to delete this email account?
Emails will be collected from remote server
Emails will not be collected from remote server
Add and edit your accounts here
Fast Sync - many times every hour
Failed to send, retry or delete
Failed to send, retry or delete. Try checking your Email account Server settings
Click camera icon to take picture
Please fill both username and password
Please make sure that your username and password correct
Message was not been able to sent
You have no friend,\n you can add new friends by menu
There is no available connected network
Not connected to the service and this is not supposed to happened so please inform this situation to ahmetmermerkaya@hotmail.com
Sign up failed because of unknown reason
Your registration is completed successfully,\n you can login now
Type same password in password fields
Your username have been already taken, please try another username
Username and password length must be at least 5
An application requires an update to the Android Wear app.
This app won\'t run unless you update the Android Wear app.
This app won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
This app won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
This app won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
An application requires Google Play services to be enabled.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
An application requires installation of Google Play services.
An application requires an update for Google Play services.
Unknown issue with Google Play services.
Google Play services, which some of your applications rely on, is not supported by your device. Please contact the manufacturer for assistance.
This app won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
Ensure the Wifi hub has UPNP enabled
Turn on and connect the device to a Wifi internet connection to enable Live Comms
Ensure device has an active Wifi Internet enabled connection
Live comms allows the Brief app to send and receive VOIP calls and directly transmit secure data app to app.
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?
Disable Javascript in RSS web view (faster page load and display)
Internet connection not responding, try again
Problem adding account, check your internet and try again
Awaiting app registration, come back in a minute
You have not set up any email accounts yet. Go to the Accounts area to add your email account.
Network error, bad connection stopped sync completing
Do you need an attachment file?
Add a person to send to
Too many matching instances to be able to order
Read disabled, ensure the device is not mounted
No storage card found, unable to access data
Write disabled, ensure the device is not mounted
All files have successfully been deleted
The following files could not be deleted:
login details are stored encrypted only on this device
Sorry, this app is old and has expired. Download the latest version to continue using Brief.
Use email address as login username
Cannot lock files required by Brief
The locker allows you to encrypt files on this device to ensure private access only
To add files to the Locker, find them in the File Manager, select and click LOCK
Enter a pass code to be entered before able to access files in the locker
Enter 3 to 12 digits in the field below (eg. 123 , 9876, 6284937290)
Enter a valid RSS http source (http://domain/uri)
Could not validate or get the RSS url
Delete your custom added RSS feed?
Could not load, check your internet connection.
Choose or set your preferred RSS feeds and filters
type in keywords or \"key terms\" followed with a space to show only RSS that DO NOT contain them in the Brief
type in keywords or \"key terms\" followed with a space to show only RSS that DO contain them in the Brief
No RSS items to display for this source
One moment, just applying filter changes to past RSS items
Select below RSS feeds of interest
Once using Brief, all message data will appear here.
Brief home displays the past 7 days of data from your selected sources, try adding Email, RSS to start seeing data appear here.
Slide items in the Inbox and Important sections to the left to mark as Read
Slide items in the Inbox and Read sections to the right to mark as Important
Set up your news sources to see news items appear here
Create notes to see them appear here
Once using your device SMS messages will appear here.
SD Card is locked for access, unlock to use brief
Do not make any changes to any files here, doing so will cause damage
Enter search terms above and click to search
After first alert, if more new alerts
Choose during each 30 minute period below how Brief is allowed to alert, none, vibrate only or vibrate and play sound
This will open Brief when you unlock your device, if you do not use Brief as the main app on your device, do not enable this feature
When connected to WiFi Brief will enable VOIP telephone and Secure transfer features
Only from people in my contact list
For privacy, use contacts only is recommended
Allow local device-to-device connections for messages and data
Send all network communications using a Proxy server
Make Brief the default SMS app for this device
Shared from Brief - the all-in-one app
Brief is not your Default SMS app
To make the most of the Brief app you should set it to operate as your default SMS app
Or choose your own news feeds to use
Get going with the following random chosen news feeds

Become a Plus member to make use of the following features:
Change and edit signatures to be appended to your emails
Safe delete overwrites each file with random data before deleting, providing a more secure way to delete your data

string.name: wallet_buy_button_place_holder
string.translation_description: Text on a button that allows a user to make a payment with Google Wallet [CHAR LIMIT=30]

resources.string: Use the control button to access other device features, accounts and app settings
Use the top select to choose any specific feeds to view
Brief takes all your regular use features on your handheld device and puts them in one easy to access place
Slide items left to mark as Read
Slide items right to mark as Important
Duplicate filenames found, change output folder
